Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Greenwood
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Cottage Grove, South Chicago and 79th: due to, street blockage near 79th/Greenwood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Cottage Grove, South Chicago and 79th: due to, street blockage near 79th/Greenwood.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute near Clark/Rogers
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses temp rerouted SB: Clark, Rogers, Ashland, Touhy, Clark; NB: Clark, Touhy, Ashland, Rogers, to terminal, due to street blockage near Clark/Rogers

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Clark/Rogers.

Southbound buses will operate via Clark, Rogers, Ashland, Touhy & Clark.

Northbound buses will operate via Clark, Touhy, Ashland, Rogers & into the terminal.

Allow extra travel time.
